name: LakeSide Hotel
desc: Full-Stack Hotel Management WebApp using Java Spring & Springboot as backend and ReactJS as frontend.

name: CuraSync
desc: Full-Stack Hospital Management WebApp with Patients' Booking Appointments functionalities & Admin Dashboard. MERN Stack WebApp, ready to use for business.

name: Real Talk
desc: This is a real-time chat application built with the MERN stack and Socket.IO . It allows users to connect, communicate, and share messages instantly.

name: YouTube Clone
desc: Fully functional YouTube clone built with MERN. It allows users to browse, search, and watch videos, similar to the original YouTube platform.
